sn55.26:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena anathapindiko gahapati abadhiko hoti dukkhito balhagilano.
sn55.26:1.3: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati annataram purisam amantesi:
sn55.26:1.4: “ehi tvam, ambho purisa, yenayasma sariputto tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena ayasmato sariputtassa pade sirasa vanda:
sn55.26:1.6: So ayasmato sariputtassa pade sirasa vandati’ti.
sn55.26:1.8: ‘sadhu kira, bhante, ayasma sariputto yena anathapindikassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya’”ti.
sn55.26:2.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so puriso anathapindikassa gahapatissa patissutva yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so puriso ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn55.26:3.2: So ayasmato sariputtassa pade sirasa vandati.
sn55.26:3.4: ‘sadhu kira, bhante, ayasma sariputto yena anathapindikassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya’”ti.
sn55.26:4.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya ayasmata anandena pacchasamanena yena anathapindikassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi. Nisajja kho ayasma sariputto anathapindikam gahapatim etadavoca:
sn55.26:4.2: “kacci te, gahapati, khamaniyam kacci yapaniyam? Kacci dukkha vedana patikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; patikkamosanam pannayati, no abhikkamo”ti?
sn55.26:4.3: “Na me, bhante, khamaniyam, na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo”ti.
sn55.26:5.1: “Yatharupena kho, gahapati, buddhe appasadena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tatharupo te buddhe appasado natthi.
sn55.26:5.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, buddhe aveccappasado—
sn55.26:5.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.26:5.4: Tanca pana te buddhe aveccappasadam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:6.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, dhamme appasadena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupo te dhamme appasado natthi.
sn55.26:6.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, dhamme aveccappasado—
sn55.26:6.3: svakkhato bhagavata dhammo …pe… paccattam veditabbo vinnuhiti.
sn55.26:6.4: Tanca pana te dhamme aveccappasadam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:7.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, sanghe appasadena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupo te sanghe appasado natthi.
sn55.26:7.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sanghe aveccappasado—
sn55.26:7.3: suppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassati.
sn55.26:7.4: Tanca pana te sanghe aveccappasadam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:8.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, dussilyena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupam te dussilyam natthi.
sn55.26:8.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, ariyakantani silani … pe samadhisamvattanikani.
sn55.26:8.3: Tani ca pana te ariyakantani silani attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:9.1: Yatharupaya kho, gahapati, micchaditthiya samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupa te micchaditthi natthi.
sn55.26:9.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaditthi.
sn55.26:9.3: Tanca pana te sammaditthim attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:10.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, micchasankappena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupo te micchasankappo natthi.
sn55.26:10.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammasankappo.
sn55.26:10.3: Tanca pana te sammasankappam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:11.1: Yatharupaya kho, gahapati, micchavacaya samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupa te micchavaca natthi.
sn55.26:11.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammavaca.
sn55.26:11.3: Tanca pana te sammavacam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:12.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, micchakammantena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupo te micchakammanto natthi.
sn55.26:12.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammakammanto.
sn55.26:12.3: Tanca pana te sammakammantam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:13.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, micchaajivena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupo te micchaajivo natthi.
sn55.26:13.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaajivo.
sn55.26:13.3: Tanca pana te sammaajivam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:14.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, micchavayamena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupo te micchavayamo natthi.
sn55.26:14.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammavayamo.
sn55.26:14.3: Tanca pana te sammavayamam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:15.1: Yatharupaya kho, gahapati, micchasatiya samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupa te micchasati natthi.
sn55.26:15.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammasati.
sn55.26:15.3: Tanca pana te sammasatim attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:16.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, micchasamadhina samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupo te micchasamadhi natthi.
sn55.26:16.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammasamadhi.
sn55.26:16.3: Tanca pana te sammasamadhim attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:17.1: Yatharupena kho, gahapati, micchananena samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupam te micchananam natthi.
sn55.26:17.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammananam.
sn55.26:17.3: Tanca pana te sammananam attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya.
sn55.26:18.1: Yatharupaya kho, gahapati, micchavimuttiya samannagato assutava puthujjano kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati, tatharupa te micchavimutti natthi.
sn55.26:18.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammavimutti.
sn55.26:18.3: Tanca pana te sammavimuttim attani samanupassato thanaso vedana patippassambheyya”ti.
sn55.26:19.1: Atha kho anathapindikassa gahapatissa thanaso vedana patippassambhimsu.
sn55.26:19.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati ayasmantanca sariputtam ayasmantanca anandam sakeneva thalipakena parivisi.
sn55.26:19.3: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati ayasmantam sariputtam bhuttavim onitapattapanim annataram nicasanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
sn55.26:19.4: Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim ayasma sariputto imahi gathahi anumodi:
sn55.26:23.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto anathapindikam gahapatim imahi gathahi anumoditva utthayasana pakkami.
sn55.26:24.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anandam bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.26:24.2: “handa kuto nu tvam, ananda, agacchasi divadivassa”ti?
sn55.26:24.3: “Ayasmata, bhante, sariputtena anathapindiko gahapati imina ca imina ca ovadena ovadito”ti.
sn55.26:24.5: mahapanno, ananda, sariputto, yatra hi nama cattari sotapattiyangani dasahakarehi vibhajissati”ti.
